name: Roussillon Going to Martel's Aid
description: Roussillon Going to Martel's Aid; Loyset Liédet (Flemish, active about 1448 - 1478), and Pol Fruit (Flemish, active about 1468); Illuminated: Bruges, Belgium; written 1463 - 1465; illuminated 1467 - 1472; Tempera colors, gold leaf, and gold paint on parchment; Leaf: 22.9 x 18.6 cm (9 x 7 5/16 in.); Ms. Ludwig XIII 6, leaf 6; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
title: Roussillon Going to Martel's Aid
medium: Tempera colors, gold leaf, and gold paint on parchment
